channel.title: Need help! confused
channel.description:
i was adding shops to my quest interface (link below)
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,252830.0.html
after i added i got some errors but i got them fixed.
now every time i compile it it shows no errors but when i run my server this pops up [code]Starting turescape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29) [/code]

item.title: Need help! confused
item.dc:creator: @gs1 gs
item.description:
@gs1 wrote:

did you add him in your client .java as a wanneshop?
did you use an already used wanneshop id?

Read full topic
